org.apache.hama.bsp.message.queue

Class SortedMemoryQueue<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<M>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.bsp.message.queue.SortedMemoryQueue<M>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<M>, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, MessageQueue<M>, SynchronizedQueue<M>

    public final class SortedMemoryQueue<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<M>>
extends Object
implements SynchronizedQueue<M>
    Heap (Java's priority queue) based message queue implementation that supports sorted receive and send.
